landing.text: The falling snow and the city that lights up: the most magical time of the year has begun. Make it even more special by virtually strolling through the streets of the Emporio Armani city and exploring the special Mall The Emporio: the right place to find the perfect gifts.

Lights, colors and the most special atmosphere of the year: enter The Emporio and let yourself be amazed by the gift ideas. Thinks of the emotion and surprise of those who will receive your gift: choosing the perfect one will be very simple.

boxes.text: The Mall The Emporio opens with men's gift ideas: an exclusive and refined selection capable of making those who open their gift smile.
The first floor is dedicated to gift ideas for her: choose the right gift to create a unique and special moment to remember.
The second floor is the most tender of the Mall: it is the one dedicated to gift ideas for the little ones. Look in a mini version and accessories for babies to be cool right away.

The floor dedicated to Armani / Casa is the right place for those looking for minimal style furnishings and accessories, simple lines and perfect proportions, enriched by elegant materials and finishes.
It's time to explore the fourth floor, the one dedicated to the world of beauty: gift ideas designed to make every moment of the day special.
We have arrived at the fifth floor, the sweetest floor of the Mall: explore the selection where you will find refined pralines, delicious chocolate bars and tasty jams.
The doors of the sixth floor open revealing the beauty of the Armani / Fiori compositions: a riot of colors and scents, capable of giving a touch of elegance and refinement.
Shining flashes, precise mechanisms and careful details: giving a watch as a gift is always a perfect gift and capable of being remembered.
